ability_set_imperialremnant_002.description:
At the start of battle, all Imperial Remnant allies gain 45% Accuracy, 45% Potency, and 20 Speed until the end of encounter.

Whenever an Imperial Remnant ally uses a Special ability, all Imperial Remnant allies gain Alert for 2 turns.

Whenever an Imperial Remnant ally defeats an enemy, all Imperial Remnant allies gain 40% Offense (max +120%) until the end of encounter.

Whenever an Imperial Remnant ally is inflicted with a debuff, they recover 10% Health and Protection.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Armor Shred all Imperial Remnant allies gain 30% Critical Chance and Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of encounter.

ability_set_badbatch_002.description:
While a Bad Batch ally is Stealthed, they gain 20% Critical Chance and 20% Critical Damage.

Whenever a Bad Batch ally uses an ability on a Marked enemy, they gain 25% Turn Meter.

While a Bad Batch ally is Captive, Bad Batch allies deal an additional instance of damage to the target enemy on their turn.

Whenever a Bad Batch ally defeats an enemy, they reset their cooldown and gain 25% Offense stacking (max 150%) until the end of encounter.

Whenever a Bad Batch ally assists, they gain +20% Offense (stacking, max +80%) and +20% Turn Meter until the end of the encounter.
ability_set_badbatch_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0} characters
ability_set_badbatch_002.fullText:

Whenever a Bad Batch ally assists, they gain +20% Offense (stacking, max +80%) and +20% Turn Meter until the end of the encounter.

ability_set_nighttrooper_002.description:
At the start of battle, Night Trooper gains 75% Potency and 25 Speed until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with a stack of Blight they inflict themselves with another stack, which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever an enemy that already had Blight is inflicted with another stack of Blight by an ally, inflict Blight on another random enemy that doesn't have it, which can't be copied, evaded, or resisted, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever Night Trooper uses Shambling Shot, they gain an additional 3 stacks of Blight which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an ally or an enemy gains or is inflicted with Blight, Night Trooper recovers 20% Health and gains 25% Offense per stack for 2 turns.
ability_set_nighttrooper_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_nighttrooper_002.fullText:
At the start of battle, Night Trooper gains 75% Potency and 25 Speed until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with a stack of Blight they inflict themselves with another stack, which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever an enemy that already had Blight is inflicted with another stack of Blight by an ally, inflict Blight on another random enemy that doesn't have it, which can't be copied, evaded, or resisted, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever Night Trooper uses Shambling Shot, they gain an additional 3 stacks of Blight which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an ally or an enemy gains or is inflicted with Blight, Night Trooper recovers 20% Health and gains 25% Offense per stack for 2 turns.

ability_set_moffgideons1_002.description:
Whenever Moff Gideon is inflicted with a debuff or gains a buff, he gains a stack of Insight and Stealths for 1 turn. Whenever he gains 4 stacks of Insight, he gains 100% Turn Meter, once every 4 turns.
Whenever an Imperial Remnant ally is inflicted with a debuff, they recover 10% Health and Protection.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Armor Shred, Blind all enemies for 1 turn, which can't be evaded or resisted.

Whenever he uses Subversive Volley, he deals bonus Massive Damage to all enemies, which can't be evaded.

ability_set_hunters3_002.description:
At the start of the encounter, Hunter (Mercenary) gains 30 Speed and all other Mercenary allies gain 10 Speed for each Mercenary ally, till the end of the encounter or until Hunter (Mercenary) is defeated for the first time. Hunter (Mercenary) is immune to Ability Block, Cooldown Increase, and Turn Meter reduction.

If all allies are Mercenaries, Marked enemies deal 50% less damage. Whenever a Marked enemy deals damage to a Mercenary ally, dispel all debuffs on that Mercenary ally and they recover 15% Protection. Whenever Hunter (Mercenary) inflicts Marked on an enemy, dispel it and inflict Marked on them for 3 turns, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted, and call all Mercenary allies with Soldier of Fortune to assist. Whenever a Mercenary ally takes a turn, the cooldown of Hunter's This Will Hurt is reduced by 1.

Hunter (Mercenary) is immune to Ability Block, Cooldown Increase, and Turn Meter reduction.

If all allies are Mercenaries, Marked enemies deal 50% less damage. Whenever a Marked enemy deals damage to a Mercenary ally, dispel all debuffs on that Mercenary ally and they recover 15% Protection. Whenever Hunter (Mercenary) inflicts Marked on an enemy, dispel it and inflict Marked on them for 3 turns, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted, and call all Mercenary allies with Soldier of Fortune to assist. Whenever a Mercenary ally takes a turn, the cooldown of Hunter's This Will Hurt is reduced by 1.

Whenever Ugnaught evades an attack, all enemies lose 10% Max Protection, which can't be resisted, doubled for Droids.

Whenever he damages a stunned enemy, he inflicts 2 stacks of Damage Over Time for 2 turns. Whenever he damages an enemy with more than 5 buffs, dispel all the buffs from target enemy, and all enemies are inflicted with 2 stacks of Damage Over Time, doubled against Droid enemies.

ability_set_pirates_001.description:
If all allies are Pirates at the start of encounter, Pirate allies gain 3 stacks of Profit. Whenever Pirate allies have 15 or more combined stacks of Profit:

- Pirate Attacker allies gain Stealth for 1 turn whenever they are critically hit.
- Whenever a Pirate Tank ally uses an ability, all other Pirate allies are called to assist.
- Whenever a Pirate Support or Healer ally is inflicted with a debuff, all Pirate allies recover 5% Health and 5% Protection.

Whenever a Pirate ally consumes a stack of Profit, all Pirate allies gain 5% Defense, Max Health, Max Protection, and Offense (stacking, max 150%) for the rest of the encounter.

ability_set_ninthsister_003.description:
At the start of encounter, all Inquisitorius allies have +200% Max Health and are immune to Ability Block.

Ninth Sister deals 20% bonus True damage based on her Max Health with her Basic ability if the target enemy is inflicted with Purge.

If any enemy has 6 stacks of Purge when Ninth Sister is defeated for the first time, she consumes all stacks of Purge from a random enemy with 6 stacks of Purge, revives with 100% Max Health and Max Protection, and removes 50% Turn Meter from all enemies.

ability_set_nighttrooper_001.description:
At the start of battle, Night Trooper gains 75% Potency and 25 Speed until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with a stack of Blight they inflict themselves with another stack, which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever an enemy that already had Blight is inflicted with another stack of Blight by an ally, inflict Blight on another random enemy that doesn't have it, which can't be copied, evaded, or resisted, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever Night Trooper uses Shambling Shot, they gain an additional 3 stacks of Blight which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an ally or an enemy gains or is inflicted with Blight, Night Trooper recovers 20% Health and gains 25% Offense per stack for 2 turns.
ability_set_nighttrooper_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_nighttrooper_001.fullText:
At the start of battle, Night Trooper gains 75% Potency and 25 Speed until the end of the encounter.
Whenever an enemy is inflicted with a stack of Blight they inflict themselves with another stack, which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever an enemy that already had Blight is inflicted with another stack of Blight by an ally, inflict Blight on another random enemy that doesn't have it, which can't be copied, evaded, or resisted, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever Night Trooper uses Shambling Shot, they gain an additional 3 stacks of Blight which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an ally or an enemy gains or is inflicted with Blight, Night Trooper recovers 20% Health and gains 25% Offense per stack for 2 turns.
ability_set_nighttrooper_001.shortText: Night trooper +75% Pot +25 Speed, Blight stuff

ability_set_jedivanguard_001.description:
If all allies are Jedi Vanguard at the start of battle, they gain Protection Up (100%) for 1 turn at the end of their turn, and additional bonuses based on their role:

- [c][B5E7F5]Attackers:[-][/c] Ignore Taunt during their turn
- [c][B5E7F5]Healers and Supports:[-][/c] The first time this character is defeated, they are revived with 100% Health and Protection
- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] Immune to Stun

Whenever an enemy dispels a buff from a Jedi Vanguard ally they are inflicted with Provoked for 2 turns. Whenever a Jedi Vanguard ally is attacked out of turn, their cooldowns are reduced by 1.

- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] Immune to Stun

Whenever an enemy dispels a buff from a Jedi Vanguard ally they are inflicted with Provoked for 2 turns. Whenever a Jedi Vanguard ally is attacked out of turn, their cooldowns are reduced by 1.

ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_supp.description:
Whenever a Support ally starts their turn dispel Tenacity Up from all enemies and then reduce their Tenacity by 100% until the end of the turn.

Whenever a Support inflicts debuff on an enemy all allies get benefits based on their roles for the rest of the encounter:

- [c][B5E7F5]Attackers:[-][/c] +10% Critical Damage
- [c][B5E7F5]Healers:[-][/c] +5% Tenacity
- [c][B5E7F5]Supports:[-][/c] +10% Potency
- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] +5% Defense

Whenever a Support grants a buff to another ally they also inflict Buff Immunity for 1 turn on all enemies.
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_supp.name: Bonus mechanics for {0} characters
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_supp.fullText:
Whenever a Support ally starts their turn dispel Tenacity Up from all enemies and then reduce their Tenacity by 100% until the end of the turn.
Whenever a Support inflicts debuff on an enemy all allies get benefits based on their roles for the rest of the encounter:

- [c][B5E7F5]Attackers: +10% Critical Damage
- [c][B5E7F5]Healers:[-][/c] +5% Tenacity
- [c][B5E7F5]Supports:[-][/c] +10% Potency
- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] +5% Defense

Whenever a Support grants a buff to another ally they also inflict Buff Immunity for 1 turn on all enemies.
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_supp.shortText: Support dispel Ten Up, debuff -> allies get bonuses, buff -> buff immunity to enemies

ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_self.description: If Director Krennic is in the Leader slot, all allies are immune to Daze and whenever an enemy is inflicted with Ability Block, all allies recover 20% Protection, all allied Tanks Taunt for 2 turns, and Krennic gains a stack of Insight until the end of the encounter (max 10). If an allied Imperial Probe Droid is present, Krennic gains an additional stack of Insight.\n\nIf Krennic has 10 stacks of Insight, whenever an enemy is inflicted with Ability Block, they are inflicted with Ability Block until the end of the encounter, which can't be copied, dispelled, prevented, or resisted.
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_self.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_self.fullText: If Director Krennic is in the Leader slot, all allies are immune to Daze and whenever an enemy is inflicted with Ability Block, all allies recover 20% Protection, all allied Tanks Taunt for 2 turns, and Krennic gains a stack of Insight until the end of the encounter (max 10). If an allied Imperial Probe Droid is present, Krennic gains an additional stack of Insight.\nIf Krennic has 10 stacks of Insight, whenever an enemy is inflicted with Ability Block, they are inflicted with Ability Block until the end of the encounter, which can't be copied, dispelled, prevented, or resisted.
ability_set_focused_directorkrennic_self.shortText: Krennic lead -> allies Daze immune, bunch of other bonuses

ability_set_crosshairs3_001.description:
Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) loses a stack of Shaken, he loses another stack of Shaken.

Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) doesn't score a critical hit, he inflicts Buff Immunity on target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.

Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) deals damage to an enemy, the weakest ally without Stealth recovers 10% Health and Protection.
ability_set_crosshairs3_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_crosshairs3_001.fullText:
Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) loses a stack of Shaken, he loses another stack of Shaken.
Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) doesn't score a critical hit, he inflicts Buff Immunity on target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.

Whenever Crosshair (Scarred) deals damage to an enemy, the weakest ally without Stealth recovers 10% Health and Protection.
ability_set_crosshairs3_001.shortText: Crosshair lose Shaken -> lose another, other crosshair bonuses

ability_set_batchers3_001.description:
Batcher is immune to Daze and Stun. Whenever Batcher damages an enemy, she removes 15% Turn Meter from them and gains that much Turn Meter.

If there are no Galactic Legends, enemies can't gain bonus Turn Meter.

Whenever another Bad Batch ally is inflicted with Captive, reset the cooldowns of Batcher's abilities, she dispels all debuffs on her, and she takes a bonus turn.
ability_set_batchers3_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_batchers3_001.fullText:
Batcher is immune to Daze and Stun. Whenever Batcher damages an enemy, she removes 15% Turn Meter from them and gains that much Turn Meter.

Whenever Bodhi Rook uses his Basic ability, the target enemy loses 30% Turn Meter, which can't be resisted.\n\nIf Bodhi Rook is defeated while another Rebel Fighter ally is active, he revives with 50% Health and takes a bonus turn.

ability_set_darthsidious_002.description:
If there are no other active allies at the start of battle:
- Darth Sidious gains 200% Defense, Health Steal, Max Health and Max Protection, 100% counter chance and Critical Chance, and 100 Speed
- He is immune to Daze and Stun
- At the start of his turn, dispel all debuffs on himself and reset all cooldowns
- Whenever he uses his Basic ability, inflict a stack of Damage Over Time for 1 turn, which can't be resisted, and whenever he uses a Special ability, dispel all buffs on all enemies
- Enemies can't assist or attack again if he is targeted
- At the start of each enemy's turn, if they have 5 stacks of Damage Over Time they are instantly defeated
- Whenever an enemy is defeated, he recovers 100% Health and Protection
ability_set_darthsidious_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_darthsidious_002.fullText:
If there are no other active allies at the start of battle:- Darth Sidious gains 200% Defense, Health Steal, Max Health and Max Protection, 100% counter chance and Critical Chance, and 100 Speed
- He is immune to Daze and Stun
- At the start of his turn, dispel all debuffs on himself and reset all cooldowns
- Whenever he uses his Basic ability, inflict a stack of Damage Over Time for 1 turn, which can't be resisted, and whenever he uses a Special ability, dispel all buffs on all enemies
- Enemies can't assist or attack again if he is targeted
- At the start of each enemy's turn, if they have 5 stacks of Damage Over Time they are instantly defeated
- Whenever an enemy is defeated, he recovers 100% Health and Protection
ability_set_darthsidious_002.shortText: Darth Sideous solo -> giant bonuses. Enemy 5 DoTs -> they die

ability_set_appo_001.description: If the allied Leader is Grand Moff Tarkin or Lord Vader and all other allies are Empire, the conditions requiring all other allies to be Dark Side Clone Troopers for CC-1119 "Appo"'s Vader's Fist Unique ability are considered met.\n\nWhenever an enemy has any amount of Damage Over Time debuff dispelled, CC-1119 "Appo" gains a stack of Operation Knightfall, and he inflicts Order 66 on a random enemy that had a stack of Damage Over Time dispelled for 1 turn, which can't be copied, dispelled, evaded, or resisted. At the start of each Dark Side Clone Trooper's turn, all allies gain 10% Defense Penetration (stacking) and Offense (stacking) for 1 turn for each stack of Operation Knightfall on CC-1119 "Appo".

Whenever Boba Fett, Scion of Jango gains a stack of Momentum, Fennec gains 5% Turn Meter. ability_set_hunters3_001.description: At the start of the encounter, Hunter (Mercenary) gains 30 Speed and all other Mercenary allies gain 10 Speed for each Mercenary ally, till the end of the encounter or until Hunter (Mercenary) is defeated for the first time. Hunter (Mercenary) is immune to Ability Block, Cooldown Increase, and Turn Meter reduction.\n\nIf all allies are Mercenaries, Marked enemies deal 50% less damage. Whenever a Marked enemy deals damage to a Mercenary ally, dispel all debuffs on that Mercenary ally and they recover 15% Protection. Whenever Hunter (Mercenary) inflicts Marked on an enemy, dispel it and inflict Marked on them for 3 turns, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted, and call all Mercenary allies with Soldier of Fortune to assist. Whenever a Mercenary ally takes a turn, the cooldown of Hunter's This Will Hurt is reduced by 1.
ability_set_hunters3_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_hunters3_001.fullText: At the start of the encounter, Hunter (Mercenary) gains 30 Speed and all other Mercenary allies gain 10 Speed for each Mercenary ally, till the end of the encounter or until Hunter (Mercenary) is defeated for the first time. Hunter (Mercenary) is immune to Ability Block, Cooldown Increase, and Turn Meter reduction.\nIf all allies are Mercenaries, Marked enemies deal 50% less damage. Whenever a Marked enemy deals damage to a Mercenary ally, dispel all debuffs on that Mercenary ally and they recover 15% Protection. Whenever Hunter (Mercenary) inflicts Marked on an enemy, dispel it and inflict Marked on them for 3 turns, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted, and call all Mercenary allies with Soldier of Fortune to assist. Whenever a Mercenary ally takes a turn, the cooldown of Hunter's This Will Hurt is reduced by 1.

ability_set_jediknightcal_003.description:
Whenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis gains a Configuration, he gains 5 stacks of Impetuous (max 30), until the end of the encounter.
Whenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis uses Impetuous Assault, he gains 50% Defense Penetration and 100% Offense for 2 turns.

Whenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis gains a buff, he gains 10% Defense (stacking, max 100%), until the end of the encounter.
ability_set_jediknightcal_003.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_jediknightcal_003.fullText: Whenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis gains a Configuration, he gains 5 stacks of Impetuous (max 30), until the end of the encounter.Whenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis uses Impetuous Assault, he gains 50% Defense Penetration and 100% Offense for 2 turns.\n\nWhenever Jedi Knight Cal Kestis gains a buff, he gains 10% Defense (stacking, max 100%), until the end of the encounter.
ability_set_jediknightcal_003.shortText: Jedi Cal switches stance -> gain 5 Impetuous, other bonuses

ability_set_enfysnest_003.description:
Enfys Nest is immune to Max Health reduction.

Whenever an ally takes a turn, Enfys Nest assists.

Whenever Enfys Nest inflicts a debuff, she gains 20% Critical Damage (stacking) until end of the encounter.

Whenever Enfys Nest uses a Special ability, she attacks again dealing 20% bonus True damage.

Whenever Enfys Nest attacks out of turn, she Exposes the target enemy for 2 turns.

Whenever an enemy takes a turn, Enfys Nest gains 5% Offense (stacking) until the end of her turn.
ability_set_enfysnest_003.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_enfysnest_003.fullText:
Enfys Nest is immune to Max Health reduction.
Whenever an ally takes a turn, Enfys Nest assists.

Whenever Enfys Nest inflicts a debuff, she gains 20% Critical Damage (stacking) until end of the encounter.

Whenever Enfys Nest uses a Special ability, she attacks again dealing 20% bonus True damage.

Whenever Enfys Nest attacks out of turn, she Exposes the target enemy for 2 turns.

Whenever an enemy takes a turn, Enfys Nest gains 5% Offense (stacking) until the end of her turn.
ability_set_enfysnest_003.shortText: Nest immune to -Max H, assists allies, other giant wall of text

ability_set_sanastarros_002.description:
At the start of encounter, all allies (excluding summoned units) gain 100% Max Health, 50% Max Protection and 25 Speed for the rest of encounter, and Defense Up for 2 turns, which can't be dispelled.
Whenever Sana Starros gains Turn Meter, all allies gain 25% Offense (stacking) for 3 turns.
Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Vulnerable, they are also Target Locked for 1 turn if they didn't already have it.

Whenever a Scoundrel ally uses a Special ability, the target enemy loses 40% Turn Meter, which can't be resisted.
Whenever a Rebel or Scoundrel ally attacks an enemy with Target Lock, they gain Retribution for 2 turns.
The first time each ally is defeated, Captain Han Solo gains a bonus turn, his cooldown resets, and all allies recover 50% Health and Protection.
ability_set_sanastarros_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_sanastarros_002.fullText:
At the start of encounter, all allies (excluding summoned units) gain 100% Max Health, 50% Max Protection and 25 Speed for the rest of encounter, and Defense Up for 2 turns, which can't be dispelled.Whenever Sana Starros gains Turn Meter, all allies gain 25% Offense (stacking) for 3 turns.
Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Vulnerable, they are also Target Locked for 1 turn if they didn't already have it.

Whenever a Scoundrel ally uses a Special ability, the target enemy loses 40% Turn Meter, which can't be resisted.
Whenever a Rebel or Scoundrel ally attacks an enemy with Target Lock, they gain Retribution for 2 turns.
The first time each ally is defeated, Captain Han Solo gains a bonus turn, his cooldown resets, and all allies recover 50% Health and Protection.
ability_set_sanastarros_002.shortText: (Sana Starros) Allies gain +100% Max H, 50% Max Prot, 25 Speed at start, other bonuses

ability_set_qira_002.description: At the start of the encounter, Qi'ra gains Damage Immunity for 2 turns, which can't be copied, dispelled or prevented.\nAt the start of her turn, Qi'ra gains Prepared. Whenever Mercenary ally attacks, she assists (once per turn) if she has Health Steal Up. Whenever she loses Prepared, she gains 5 stacks of Soldier of Fortune and 20% Potency (stacking, max 100%) until the end of encounter. The first time she uses a Special ability, when she has 20 stacks of Soldier of Fortune, she inflicts Healing Immunity and Protection Disruption for 3 turns on target enemy, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted.
ability_set_qira_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_qira_002.fullText: At the start of the encounter, Qi'ra gains Damage Immunity for 2 turns, which can't be copied, dispelled or prevented.At the start of her turn, Qi'ra gains Prepared. Whenever Mercenary ally attacks, she assists (once per turn) if she has Health Steal Up. Whenever she loses Prepared, she gains 5 stacks of Soldier of Fortune and 20% Potency (stacking, max 100%) until the end of encounter. The first time she uses a Special ability, when she has 20 stacks of Soldier of Fortune, she inflicts Healing Immunity and Protection Disruption for 3 turns on target enemy, which can't be dispelled, evaded, or resisted.
ability_set_qira_002.shortText: Start of battle -> Qi'ra Dmg Immunity, start of turn -> gain prepared, other random bonuses

ability_set_humanthug_003.description:
If the ally in the Leader slot is Hutt Cartel, whenever they use an ability, Mob Enforcer assists, dealing 50% more damage.

At the start of Mob Enforcer's turn, all enemies inflicted with Thermal Detonators are inflicted with Buff Immunity for 1 turn.

Whenever Mob Enforcer attacks out of turn, she always scores a critical hit, if able.

Whenever an enemy critically hits Mob Enforcer, that enemy is inflicted with a stack of Thermal Detonator for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.
ability_set_humanthug_003.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_humanthug_003.fullText:
If the ally in the Leader slot is Hutt Cartel, whenever they use an ability, Mob Enforcer assists, dealing 50% more damage.
At the start of Mob Enforcer's turn, all enemies inflicted with Thermal Detonators are inflicted with Buff Immunity for 1 turn.

Whenever Mob Enforcer attacks out of turn, she always scores a critical hit, if able.

Whenever an enemy critically hits Mob Enforcer, that enemy is inflicted with a stack of Thermal Detonator for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.
ability_set_humanthug_003.shortText: (Mob Enforcer) If HC lead, ME assists allies, dets -> buff immunity at start of ME turn

ability_set_gamorreanguard_003.description:
At the start of encounter, Gamorrean Guard gains 5 stacks of My Kind of Scum, 100% Potency, 50 Speed. Then he gains 20% Counter Chance for each Hutt Cartel ally.

Whenever Gamorrean Guard inflicts a stack of Damage Over Time, he gains Riposte for 2 turns.

While Taunting, he takes 30% reduced damage from enemies with a stack of Damage Over Time or Thermal Detonators.

Whenever Gamorrean Guard removes Turn Meter from an enemy, reduce the cooldown of his abilities by 1.

ability_set_hk47_002.description:
At the start of encounter, HK-47 gains 15 Speed for each Droid or Scoundrel ally.

At the start of HK-47's turn, he inflicts Evasion Down on all enemies for 1 turn, which can't be resisted.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Burning or Torture HK-47's Ability Cooldowns are reset.

Whenever HK-47 uses Assassination Protocol, HK-47 inflicts Ability Block on target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be resisted.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Tenacity Down, they are also inflicted with Fear for 1 turn, which can't be resisted.
ability_set_hk47_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}

ability_set_baylanskoll_001.description:
While Baylan is Taunting, he has +200% Defense, reduces the damage he receives by 15%, and gains Instant Defeat Immunity until he loses Taunt, which can't be dispelled.

Otherwise, he recovers 10% Health and Protection whenever he attacks out of turn, and is immune to Ability Block.

Whenever Baylan Taunts, Mercenary allies recover 25% Health and Protection. Whenever he loses Taunt, he has a 50% chance to reduce his cooldowns by 1.

ability_set_carthonasi_002.description:
Carth Onasi has +100% Max Health, Max Protection, and Potency and he gains 15% Turn Meter whenever another character ends their turn. Whenever he uses his Basic ability, he attacks two more times.

Whenever an Old Republic ally resists a debuff, they dispel all debuffs on themselves and gain 10% Tenacity (stacking) until the end of battle. Whenever an Old Republic ally is Dazed, they dispel it. When they dispel Daze, they gain 15% Turn Meter.

Whenever Carth uses a Special ability, he triggers the damage of all Damage Over Time debuffs on enemies.

Whenever an enemy is defeated, Carth gains 25% Offense (stacking) and Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of the battle, his cooldowns are reset, and he gains 100% Turn Meter.

Whenever Carth uses a Special ability, he triggers the damage of all Damage Over Time debuffs on enemies.

Whenever an enemy is defeated, Carth gains 25% Offense (stacking) and Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of the battle, his cooldowns are reset, and he gains 100% Turn Meter.

Whenever an ally attacks out of turn, they deal 35% more damage.

At the start of battle, all allies gain 100% Max Health and Max Protection and are immune to Healing Immunity.

Whenever Pao uses Special ability, he Shocks all enemies for 2 turns, which can't be evaded.

Whenever Pao uses a Basic ability on his turn, he Stealths and gains Defense Penetration Up for 1 turn and inflicts target enemy with Offense Down for 1 turn, which can't be evaded.

ability_set_plokoon_001.description:
At the start of Battle, Plo gains 100% Defense and Max Health and Protection.

Whenever Plo Koon uses his Basic ability, he deals 25% bonus True damage based on his Max Health, which can't be evaded. Whenever another ally uses an ability while buffed on their turn, Plo assists.
Whenever Plo uses a Special ability, Stun all enemies for 1 turn, which can't be evaded.

Whenever Plo gains Defense Up, he also gains 5% Max Health (stacking) until the end of encounter. Whenever Defense Up expires, he Taunts and gains Damage Immunity for 1 turn and inflicts Ability Block to all enemies for 2 turns, which can't be evaded.

ability_set_eethkoth_001.description:
At the start of battle, Galactic Republic Jedi allies gain 100% Offense and 20 Speed, and are immune to Buff Immunity. Eeth gains 100% Max Health and Protection.

If the Leader is a Galactic Republic Jedi, whenever they take damage, Eeth Taunts and gains Foresight until he evades.

Whenever Eeth evades an attack, he gains 10% Turn Meter and all Galactic Republic Jedi allies recover 20% Health and Protection.

Whenever Eeth uses a Special ability, he gains 10% Turn Meter, Blinds all enemies for 2 turns, which can't be evaded, and all Galactic Republic Jedi allies recover 20% Health and Protection and gain Protection Up (50%) for 2 turns.

Whenever Eeth uses a Basic ability, Daze target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be evaded.

Whenever a Galactic Republic Jedi ally gains Foresight, if they didn't already have it, all Galactic Republic Jedi allies gain 20% Turn Meter and recover 20% Health and Protection.

Whenever Eeth evades an attack, he gains 10% Turn Meter and all Galactic Republic Jedi allies recover 20% Health and Protection.

Whenever Eeth uses a Basic ability, Daze target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be evaded.

Whenever a Galactic Republic Jedi ally gains Foresight, if they didn't already have it, all Galactic Republic Jedi allies gain 20% Turn Meter and recover 20% Health and Protection.

ability_set_greatmothers_001.description:
At the start of battle, Nightsister allies gain 200% Defense and 100% Health and Protection, and are immune to Daze and Fear.

Whenever an enemy attacks out of turn:
- they take damage equal to 35% of their Max Health, which can't be evaded and this damage can't defeat enemies
- Attacker allies gain Retribution for 1 turn
- all Nightsister allies recover 30% Health and Protection

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Doomed, they can't counter attack until they are defeated, are Stunned for 1 turn, and have -20% Offense for the rest of the encounter. Whenever this Stun expires, they gain a bonus turn and Speed Up for 2 turns which can't be evaded, dispelled, prevented, or resisted.

While an ally has Blessed they and Great Mothers take -35% reduced damage and they deal bonus True damage to target enemy, which can't be evaded, whenever they use an ability.

Whenever an enemy is defeated, they can't be revived.

ability_set_greatmothers_001.description:
At the start of battle, Nightsister allies gain 200% Defense and 100% Health and Protection, and are immune to Daze and Fear.

Whenever an enemy attacks out of turn:
- they take damage equal to 35% of their Max Health, which can't be evaded and this damage can't defeat enemies
- Attacker allies gain Retribution for 1 turn
- all Nightsister allies recover 30% Health and Protection

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Doomed, they can't counter attack until they are defeated, are Stunned for 1 turn, and have -20% Offense for the rest of the encounter. Whenever this Stun expires, they gain a bonus turn and Speed Up for 2 turns which can't be evaded, dispelled, prevented, or resisted.

While an ally has Blessed they and Great Mothers take -35% reduced damage and they deal bonus True damage to target enemy, which can't be evaded, whenever they use an ability.

Whenever an enemy is defeated, they can't be revived.
ability_set_greatmothers_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_greatmothers_001.fullText:
At the start of battle, Nightsister allies gain 200% Defense and 100% Health and Protection, and are immune to Daze and Fear.
Whenever an enemy attacks out of turn:
- they take damage equal to 35% of their Max Health, which can't be evaded and this damage can't defeat enemies
- Attacker allies gain Retribution for 1 turn
- all Nightsister allies recover 30% Health and Protection

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with Doomed, they can't counter attack until they are defeated, are Stunned for 1 turn, and have -20% Offense for the rest of the encounter. Whenever this Stun expires, they gain a bonus turn and Speed Up for 2 turns which can't be evaded, dispelled, prevented, or resisted.

While an ally has Blessed they and Great Mothers take -35% reduced damage and they deal bonus True damage to target enemy, which can't be evaded, whenever they use an ability.

Whenever an enemy is defeated, they can't be revived.
ability_set_greatmothers_001.shortText: Great Mothers great wall of text

ability_set_healer_001.description:
Whenever a character is healed by an allied Healer they reduce their cooldowns by 1.

Whenever an ally Healer is critically hit they recover 10% Health and gain 10 Speed (stacking, max 100) for the rest of the encounter.

Whenever an ally is revived on an ally Healer's turn all allies recover 100% Max Health and Max Protection.

The first time each Healer ally is defeated they are revived and recover 100% Max Health.

ability_set_healer_001.fullText:
Whenever a character is healed by an allied Healer they reduce their cooldowns by 1.
Whenever an ally Healer is critically hit they recover 10% Health and gain 10 Speed (stacking, max 100) for the rest of the encounter.

Whenever an ally is revived on an ally Healer's turn all allies recover 100% Max Health and Max Protection.

The first time each Healer ally is defeated they are revived and recover 100% Max Health.

ability_set_support_001.description:
Whenever a Support ally starts their turn dispel Tenacity Up from all enemies and then reduce their Tenacity by 100% until the end of the turn.

Whenever a Support inflicts debuff on an enemy all allies get benefits based on their roles for the rest of the encounter:

- [c][B5E7F5]Attackers:[-][/c] +10% Critical Damage
- [c][B5E7F5]Healers:[-][/c] +5% Tenacity
- [c][B5E7F5]Supports:[-][/c] +10% Potency
- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] +5% Defense

Whenever a Support grants a buff to another ally they also inflict Buff Immunity for 1 turn on all enemies.
ability_set_support_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0} characters
ability_set_support_001.fullText:
Whenever a Support ally starts their turn dispel Tenacity Up from all enemies and then reduce their Tenacity by 100% until the end of the turn.

- [c][B5E7F5]Healers:[-][/c] +5% Tenacity
- [c][B5E7F5]Supports:[-][/c] +10% Potency
- [c][B5E7F5]Tanks:[-][/c] +5% Defense

Whenever a Support grants a buff to another ally they also inflict Buff Immunity for 1 turn on all enemies.
ability_set_support_001.shortText: Support dispel Ten Up, debuff -> allies get bonuses, buff -> buff immunity to enemies

ability_set_jediknightconsular_001.description:
While Jedi Consular is active all Jedi allies are immune to Healing Immunity.

Whenever Jedi Consular uses his Basic ability, reduce his cooldowns by 1 and he gains 7% Max Health (stacking, Max 210%) for the rest of the encounter.

Whenever Jedi Consular heals an ally, dispel all debuffs on them and they gain Jedi's Will for 2 turns.

Whenever Jedi Consular uses Jedi Healing, revive all non-Jedi allies with 100% Max Health and Max Protection.

Whenever Jedi Consular uses Attack as Defense deal bonus True damage equal to 50% his Max Health, which can't be evaded.

The first time Jedi Consular falls below 25% Health, he gains 100% Evasion for 2 turns.
ability_set_jediknightconsular_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_jediknightconsular_001.fullText:
While Jedi Consular is active all Jedi allies are immune to Healing Immunity.
Whenever Jedi Consular uses his Basic ability, reduce his cooldowns by 1 and he gains 7% Max Health (stacking, Max 210%) for the rest of the encounter.

Whenever Jedi Consular heals an ally, dispel all debuffs on them and they gain Jedi's Will for 2 turns.

Whenever Jedi Consular uses Jedi Healing, revive all non-Jedi allies with 100% Max Health and Max Protection.

Whenever Jedi Consular uses Attack as Defense deal bonus True damage equal to 50% his Max Health, which can't be evaded.

The first time Jedi Consular falls below 25% Health, he gains 100% Evasion for 2 turns.

Whenever she gains Turn Meter, all allies gain 10% Max Health (stacking, max 150%) for rest of the encounter and she dispels all buffs from a random enemy.

Whenever Barriss is critically hit all Jedi allies gains 10% Critical Damage (stacking) for the rest of the encounter.

Whenever she gains Turn Meter, all allies gain 10% Max Health (stacking, max 150%) for rest of the encounter and she dispels all buffs from a random enemy.

Whenever Barriss is critically hit all Jedi allies gains 10% Critical Damage (stacking) for the rest of the encounter.

ability_set_coruscantunderworldpolice_00.description:
Whenever Coruscant Underworld Police uses a Special ability, Shock all enemies for 2 turns which can't be evaded or resisted.

The first time Coruscant Underworld Police reaches 50% Health he gains Damage Immunity for 3 turns.

At the start of Coruscant Underworld Police's turn, he gains 15% Offense per active ally, his attacks ignore Protection, and a random ally recovers 100% Protection, until the end of his turn.

Whenever Coruscant Underworld Police uses a Special ability call all allies to assist and the target enemy loses 10% Max Health until end of the encounter.

Whenever Coruscant Underworld Police uses a Special ability, Shock all enemies for 2 turns which can't be evaded or resisted.
The first time Coruscant Underworld Police reaches 50% Health he gains Damage Immunity for 3 turns.

At the start of Coruscant Underworld Police's turn, he gains 15% Offense per active ally, his attacks ignore Protection, and a random ally recovers 100% Protection, until the end of his turn.

Whenever Coruscant Underworld Police uses a Special ability call all allies to assist and the target enemy loses 10% Max Health until end of the encounter.

ability_set_nightrooper_001.description:
At the start of battle, Night Trooper gains 75% Potency and 25 Speed until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an enemy is inflicted with a stack of Blight they inflict themselves with another stack, which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever an enemy that already had Blight is inflicted with another stack of Blight by an ally, inflict Blight on another random enemy that doesn't have it, which can't be copied, evaded, or resisted, until the end of the encounter or until they fully recover their Health.

Whenever Night Trooper uses Shambling Shot, they gain an additional 3 stacks of Blight which can't be copied or evaded, until the end of the encounter.

Whenever an ally or an enemy gains or is inflicted with Blight, Night Trooper recovers 20% Health and gains 25% Offense per stack for 2 turns.

Whenever a Gungan ally is damaged or the allied Shield Generator loses a stack of Plasma Shielding, remove 1 stack of Recharge from the allied Shield Generator.

Whenever the allied Shield Generator uses Plasma Pulse, dispel all debuffs from all Gungan allies and inflict Plasma Residue on all enemies for 1 turn, which can't be resisted. If an enemy is already inflicted with Plasma Residue, remove 100% Turn Meter, Daze, Stagger, and Stun them for 1 turn.

Whenever a Gungan ally deals damage to a debuffed enemy, they also deal 5% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.

ability_set_gungan_001.fullText:
Whenever a Gungan ally is damaged or the allied Shield Generator loses a stack of Plasma Shielding, remove 1 stack of Recharge from the allied Shield Generator.
Whenever the allied Shield Generator uses Plasma Pulse, dispel all debuffs from all Gungan allies and inflict Plasma Residue on all enemies for 1 turn, which can't be resisted. If an enemy is already inflicted with Plasma Residue, remove 100% Turn Meter, Daze, Stagger, and Stun them for 1 turn.

Whenever a Gungan ally deals damage to a debuffed enemy, they also deal 5% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.
ability_set_gungan_001.shortText: Gungan damaged -> Shield Gen stuff, extra dmg to debuffed enemies

ability_set_inquisitorius_003.description:
Whenever an Inquisitorius ally inflicts a stack of Purge, they gain 5% Defense, Offense, and Tenacity (stacking) for 1 turn.

Whenever a stack of Purge is consumed or dispelled on an enemy Expose them for 1 turn.

Whenever an Inquisitorius ally uses a Basic ability against an enemy inflicted with a stack of Purge, a random other Inquisitorius ally assists, dealing 5% bonus damage per stack of Purge and then they inflict a stack of Purge (max 6) on target enemy, which can't be evaded.
ability_set_inquisitorius_003.name: Bonus mechanics for {0} characters
ability_set_inquisitorius_003.fullText:
Whenever an Inquisitorius ally inflicts a stack of Purge, they gain 5% Defense, Offense, and Tenacity (stacking) for 1 turn.
Whenever a stack of Purge is consumed or dispelled on an enemy Expose them for 1 turn.

Whenever an Inquisitorius ally uses a Basic ability against an enemy inflicted with a stack of Purge, a random other Inquisitorius ally assists, dealing 5% bonus damage per stack of Purge and then they inflict a stack of Purge (max 6) on target enemy, which can't be evaded.

ability_set_firstorder_002.description:
Whenever a First Order ally scores a critical hit, the Leader gains 10% Offense (stacking, max 200%) until the end of encounter. If the Leader scores a critical hit, they gain an additional 10% Offense, and all other First Order allies recover 15% Health and Protection.

Whenever the Leader uses an ability, remove 1% Turn Meter from all other First Order allies. Whenever a First Order ally loses Turn Meter, they gain 10% Critical Damage (stacking) for 2 turns.

Whenever a First Order ally attacks a Stunned enemy, they deal 10% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.

Whenever the Leader is not damaged during the enemy's turn, if there are no allies with Damage Immunity, a random First Order ally gains Damage Immunity for 1 turn.
ability_set_firstorder_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0} characters
ability_set_firstorder_002.fullText:
Whenever a First Order ally scores a critical hit, the Leader gains 10% Offense (stacking, max 200%) until the end of encounter. If the Leader scores a critical hit, they gain an additional 10% Offense, and all other First Order allies recover 15% Health and Protection.
Whenever the Leader uses an ability, remove 1% Turn Meter from all other First Order allies. Whenever a First Order ally loses Turn Meter, they gain 10% Critical Damage (stacking) for 2 turns.

Whenever a First Order ally attacks a Stunned enemy, they deal 10% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.

Whenever the Leader is not damaged during the enemy's turn, if there are no allies with Damage Immunity, a random First Order ally gains Damage Immunity for 1 turn.
ability_set_firstorder_002.shortText: FO crit -> 10% Off, more leader bonuses/dmg immunity

ability_set_jarjar_001.description:
Whenever Jar Jar Binks inflicts a debuff or is inflicted with a debuff, he gains 10% Turn Meter.

Whenever a Gungan ally assists Jar Jar Binks, they Shock the target enemy for 1 turn if they are inflicted with Plasma Residue. Otherwise, apply a stack of Frustration for 1 turn. At the start of each other Gungan ally's turn, they inflict Accuracy Down and Evasion Down on the healthiest enemy for 1 turn.

If all allies are Gungan at the start of battle: whenever Jar Jar Binks evades an attack, a random enemy's cooldowns are increased by 1and a random Gungan ally's cooldowns are decreased by 1.
ability_set_jarjar_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_jarjar_001.fullText:
Whenever Jar Jar Binks inflicts a debuff or is inflicted with a debuff, he gains 10% Turn Meter.
Whenever a Gungan ally assists Jar Jar Binks, they Shock the target enemy for 1 turn if they are inflicted with Plasma Residue. Otherwise, apply a stack of Frustration for 1 turn. At the start of each other Gungan ally's turn, they inflict Accuracy Down and Evasion Down on the healthiest enemy for 1 turn.

If all allies are Gungan at the start of battle: whenever Jar Jar Binks evades an attack, a random enemy's cooldowns are increased by 1and a random Gungan ally's cooldowns are decreased by 1.
ability_set_jarjar_001.shortText: Jar Jar debuff -> 10% TM, evade -> CD increase/decrease

ability_set_bossnass_001.description:
Whenever Boss Nass dispels a debuff from himself, he and the weakest other Gungan ally gain 5% Max Protection (stacking, max 200%) until the end of encounter and he removes 1 stack of Recharge from the allied Shield Generator.

Whenever the enemy is inflicted with Plasma Residue or Frustration, they are Blinded for 1 turn.

The first time the allied Shield Generator's Plasma Shield reaches 0, it recovers 10 stacks of Plasma Shield.
ability_set_bossnass_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_bossnass_001.fullText:
Whenever Boss Nass dispels a debuff from himself, he and the weakest other Gungan ally gain 5% Max Protection (stacking, max 200%) until the end of encounter and he removes 1 stack of Recharge from the allied Shield Generator.

ability_set_padmeamidala_001.description:
Whenever a Galactic Republic ally with Courage or Protection Up uses an ability, if there are no enemies with Provoke, a random enemy is inflicted with Provoke for 1 turn. Whenever another Galactic Republic ally recovers Health or Protection, Padm recovers double that amount.

Whenever an enemy targets a Non-Galactic Legend Galactic Republic ally with Protection Up while attacking out of turn, the damage they receive is reduced to 1 and the attacking enemy is Exposed for 1 turn.

Whenever a Non-Galactic Legend Galactic Republic ally resists a debuff, they gain a stack of Courage, and whenever they are inflicted with a debuff, they gain Protection Up (10%, stacking) and Tenacity Up for 2 turns.

ability_set_seventhsister_002.shortText: Start of Seventh Sister turn -> dispel all debuffs, +5% H healed per debuff

ability_set_tiefighterpilot_002.description: First Order SF TIE Pilot has +100% Potency. While allied Supreme Leader Kylo Ren is active, First Order SF TIE Pilot can't be defeated. While First Order allies have Advantage, they ignore Taunt.\n\nWhenever the ally in the Leader slot or First Order SF TIE Pilot is damaged while they have Advantage, Stun that enemy for 1 turn, which can't be resisted. Whenever an enemy is Stunned, First Order SF TIE Pilot's abilities gain 5% bonus damage (stacking, max 200%), he and the ally in the Leader slot gain 10% Max Health  until the end of the encounter, and if the ally in the Leader slot is Supreme Leader Kylo Ren, he gains 5% Ultimate Charge. Whenever a Stunned enemy is defeated, they can't be revived, the ally in the Leader slot gains a bonus turn, and the allied Leader and First Order SF TIE Pilot recover 100% Health and Protection.
ability_set_tiefighterpilot_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_tiefighterpilot_002.fullText: First Order SF TIE Pilot has +100% Potency. While allied Supreme Leader Kylo Ren is active, First Order SF TIE Pilot can't be defeated. While First Order allies have Advantage, they ignore Taunt.\nWhenever the ally in the Leader slot or First Order SF TIE Pilot is damaged while they have Advantage, Stun that enemy for 1 turn, which can't be resisted. Whenever an enemy is Stunned, First Order SF TIE Pilot's abilities gain 5% bonus damage (stacking, max 200%), he and the ally in the Leader slot gain 10% Max Health  until the end of the encounter, and if the ally in the Leader slot is Supreme Leader Kylo Ren, he gains 5% Ultimate Charge. Whenever a Stunned enemy is defeated, they can't be revived, the ally in the Leader slot gains a bonus turn, and the allied Leader and First Order SF TIE Pilot recover 100% Health and Protection.
ability_set_tiefighterpilot_002.shortText: FOSFTP gets bonuses, but really SLKR gets more

ability_set_firstordertrooper_002.description: At the start of encounter, First Order Storm Trooper gains 100% Max Health and Max Protection, and the allied Leader gains 50% Armor Penetaration and Offense. Whenever Stun expires or is dispelled from an enemy, First Order Storm Trooper gains 10% Defense and Tenacity (stacking), and the ally in the Leader slot gains 10% Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of encounter.\n\nWhenever another First Order ally is critically hit, First Order Storm Trooper gains Protection Up (25%, stacking) and Taunts for 2 turns. Whenever First Order Storm Trooper uses The Order Relentless, he also dispels all debuffs from all First Order allies and they recover 50% Health.
ability_set_firstordertrooper_002.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_firstordertrooper_002.fullText: At the start of encounter, First Order Storm Trooper gains 100% Max Health and Max Protection, and the allied Leader gains 50% Armor Penetaration and Offense. Whenever Stun expires or is dispelled from an enemy, First Order Storm Trooper gains 10% Defense and Tenacity (stacking), and the ally in the Leader slot gains 10% Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of encounter.\nWhenever another First Order ally is critically hit, First Order Storm Trooper gains Protection Up (25%, stacking) and Taunts for 2 turns. Whenever First Order Storm Trooper uses The Order Relentless, he also dispels all debuffs from all First Order allies and they recover 50% Health.

ability_set_darthbane_001.description: At the start of Darth Bane's turn, all enemies gain Accuracy Up, Advantage, and Health Steal Up for 1 turn or until they receive damage, and summon a Sith Trooper in the allied ally slot if it is available and there are no other Sith Trooper allies. ability_set_darthsidious_001.description:
If there are no other active allies at the start of battle:
- Darth Sidious gains 200% Defense, Health Steal, Max Health and Max Protection, 100% counter chance and Critical Chance, and 100 Speed
- He is immune to Daze and Stun
- At the start of his turn, dispel all debuffs on himself and reset all cooldowns
- Whenever he uses his Basic ability, inflict a stack of Damage Over Time for 1 turn, which can't be resisted, and whenever he uses a Special ability, dispel all buffs on all enemies
- Enemies can't assist or attack again if he is targeted
- At the start of each enemy's turn, if they have 5 stacks of Damage Over Time they are instantly defeated
- Whenever an enemy is defeated, he recovers 100% Health and Protection
ability_set_darthsidious_001.name: Bonus mechanics for {0}
ability_set_darthsidious_001.fullText:
If there are no other active allies at the start of battle:- Darth Sidious gains 200% Defense, Health Steal, Max Health and Max Protection, 100% counter chance and Critical Chance, and 100 Speed
- He is immune to Daze and Stun
- At the start of his turn, dispel all debuffs on himself and reset all cooldowns
- Whenever he uses his Basic ability, inflict a stack of Damage Over Time for 1 turn, which can't be resisted, and whenever he uses a Special ability, dispel all buffs on all enemies
- Enemies can't assist or attack again if he is targeted
- At the start of each enemy's turn, if they have 5 stacks of Damage Over Time they are instantly defeated
- Whenever an enemy is defeated, he recovers 100% Health and Protection
ability_set_darthsidious_001.shortText: Darth Sideous solo -> giant bonuses. Enemy 5 DoTs -> they die
